MessageJP: シグレ
MessageEN: Shigure

MessageJP: 既読
MessageEN: Message read

MessageJP: 先生、さっき聞いたんだけど
MessageEN: You need something, Sensei?

MessageJP: もしかして、私のこと探してた？
MessageEN: I heard you were looking for me.

MessageJP: うん、後で時間貰える？
MessageEN: I was. Do you have some free time?

MessageJP: この間のお礼をしたくて
MessageTW: 我想答謝你之前的幫忙
MessageEN: I wanted to repay you for helping me last time.

MessageJP: へえ、楽しみにしてるね
MessageEN: Oh...

MessageJP: そんなに気にしなくていいのに、ふふ
MessageTW: 其實不用那麼客氣的，呵呵
MessageEN: I didn't expect you to be so...forward, I guess.

MessageJP: まあ、構わないけど
MessageEN: Well...

MessageJP: 了解
MessageEN: Sure, why not?

MessageJP: じゃあ、また後で
MessageEN: I'll look forward to it.

MessageJP: よろしくね
MessageEN: See you soon, Sensei.

MessageJP: シグレの絆イベントへ
MessageEN: Go to Shigure's Event

MessageJP: 先生、無事に帰れた？
MessageEN: Did you get home okay, Sensei?

MessageJP: まあ、今日は先生が迷うような場所じゃなかったけど
MessageTW: 雖然今天老師不是在會迷路的地方就是了
MessageEN: I wasn't too worried, this time at least. Even you can't lose the path on a day like today.

MessageJP: うん、ちゃんと帰れたよ
MessageEN: I'm safe and sound. What about you?

MessageJP: シグレこそ、大丈夫？
MessageEN: Did you get home safely?

MessageJP: うん、おかげさまで
MessageEN: Yes, thanks to you.

MessageJP: 今日は本当にありがとね
MessageEN: Seriously, thanks. The food was really good too.

MessageJP: 次は私がお礼をする番かな
MessageTW: 下次就輪到我回禮了呢
MessageEN: Next time, let me treat you.

MessageJP: こうやってお礼が重なり続けるのも、何だか悪くないかなって
MessageTW: 像這樣不斷禮尚往來好像也不錯
MessageEN: That kind of give-and-take'd be nice, you know?

MessageJP: だから、その時はよろしくね
MessageEN: Good? The next one's on me.

MessageJP: ふふっ
MessageEN: Heehee.

MessageJP: それじゃ、良い一日を
MessageTW: 那麼，祝你有美好的一天
MessageEN: Okay, have a good one, Sensei.
